onetomany.bargainingchipsgame

Class Stack

  • java.lang.Object
    • onetomany.bargainingchipsgame.Stack

  • public class Stack
extends java.lang.Object
    Stack contains a number of Chips of the same color and price. A stack=(chip, quantity). Aggregation of a two stacks of the same colors, creates another stack with the total quantity but its chip in a new price equal to weighted average of the both unit prices. Aggregation of a stack with the empty stack is itself.
    Author:
    Faria Nassiri-Mofakham
